00024     def eval(self, pop=None):
00025         if not pop:
00026             pop = self.pop
00027 
00028         fitness_func = self.params.app.fitness
00029         for ind in pop:
00030             fitness_func(ind)
00031         # scale fitness of population
00032         self.params.app.scaleFitness(pop)

00044     def crossover(self, parent1, parent2):
00045         child1, child2 = self.params.crossover(parent1, parent2)
00046         return child1, child2

00049     def nextgen(self):
00050         '''
00051         Create next generation from current population.
00052         '''
00053         newPop = []
00054         for i in xrange(0, self.popsize, 2):
00055             p1 = self.selectParent()
00056             p2 = self.selectParent()
00057             c1, c2 = self.crossover(p1, p2)
00058             self.params.mutate(c1)
00059             self.params.mutate(c2)
00060             newPop.extend([c1, c2])
00061 
00062         self.eval(newPop)
00063         self.combinepop(newPop)
